text:
Today I worked:* from 9am to 5.30pm
*Today tasks / activities I worked on: commenced work on Q4 forecast and discussed consolidated budget deadlines with Japan/India.
*Today my colleague told me:* I deserve a break !
*Today I'm learning / reading:* unfortunately my study books ! I have an exam on the 5th :(
*Today I felt: very stressed as I got a list of deadlines that have to be met in December and January !
